definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
pitch-black/(fig.) to be completely in the dark
pitch-black/(fig.) to be completely in the dark

sentences.english: The kitchen is unperceived in a white lacquer and stainless steel orthogonal form.
sentences.chinese: 廚房是白色的漆和互相垂直的不鏽鋼。

sentences.english: Being applicable at low temperatures it offers a suitable alternative to coal tar epoxy.
sentences.chinese: 低溫時，可作爲環氧煤焦瀝青漆的替代物。

sentences.english: Huian female wearing the hats painted yellow paint, with the role of anti-sun and rain.
sentences.chinese: 惠安女頭戴的斗笠塗上黃漆，具有防日曬雨淋作用。

sentences.english: The obtained topcoat shows good weatherability and anti -corrosion property.
sentences.chinese: 該面漆具有優良的耐候性能和防腐蝕性能。

sentences.english: Paint with imported painting to guarantee of three-year no fading.
sentences.chinese: 面漆用進口漆，保證三年不退色。

sentences.english: DL rent from Hai-Shan Coal Mine has also repainted into blue.
sentences.chinese: 租自海山煤礦的柴油機車也漆上了藍色新漆。

sentences.english: He smacked the Book angrily on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他給那張桌子上了兩道漆。

sentences.english: What is the application rate of Bona Naturale?
sentences.chinese: 博納自然漆的使用量是多少？

sentences.english: Many wooden boxes exported to USA are painted with black matte ink.
sentences.chinese: 很多出口美國的木盒都是黑色啞光漆的。

sentences.english: The general process of paint of metals flash is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了金屬閃光漆的一般施工工藝。

sentences.english: On the gilded Fujian lacquer tray also lay the morning newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 描金的福建漆盤子裏還放着當天的報。

sentences.english: Responsible for preparation of all surfaces prior to painting or varnishing.
sentences.chinese: 負責所有表面在油漆或上漆之前的準備工作。

sentences.english: Gus in his red jacket and patent-leather boots, whip in hand, stepped to the door of the cage.
sentences.chinese: 葛斯穿著紅夾克，漆皮靴，手握長鞭，走到獸籠門前。

sentences.english: This means that the colorant cannot develop its full colour strength in the paint.
sentences.chinese: 有不相容時，色漿在漆中無法完全展色。

definition: to apply paint, veneer etc/to plaster over/decorative coating/finish/veneer
to peel off (paint)/(fig.) to be exposed/to lose face (Tw)
